channel.title: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible
channel.description:
Now I know there is alot, and I mean [b]ALOT[/b] of people asking for help, and well, im a noob and know nothing about java script... So, i was wondering if i can ask for the codes lol >.< :P Well, your probably gonna call me a noob, so do so if u must, but I was just hoping someone could help me with my server, you see, most servers aren't very stable so i was hoping I could create my own.
I've downloaded some files off theasseffect, from ragezone, so I dont have 'Testscape, cheezscape nitxscape' so yea, and the java doesnt have the same codes I think...
1.Anyhow, all I want to do right now is create a general shop owner in varrock for the general store and I want to place some items in... how would I do this?
2. Create a few monsters roaming around in lumbridge, maybe jus cows for now... So.. how would I do this? Um is there a possible way for them to walk around as well?
3. I would like to know how to create a code to get a pack of items, supposing i type in a command such as... ::dragonset and when i type that in, i get all the dragon weps, armours ect. How would I do this lol?
4. one more final thing... how would I make it so only admins can do this?
OH i have another question, lol sorry for being noob. Um how would i make it so that if u create an account, u become a normal player instead of admin, cuz i dont want all players admins lol.
Heh, sorry for the ultimate "Noob" if you will, I just really want to create a server, and i dont bother waiting till im older...
Thanks in return, once again, sorry for being 'noob'
EDIT: I jus remembered that in the sticky, it says for me to learn some java... do I really have to listen to that or can i just ask for help?

item.title: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

now it says this when i compile it:

client.java:1000: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (command.startsWith(“dragonset”))
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

So… now what? what did i do wrong?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 11:59:57 PM[/size][hr]someone plz help

by da way, im using Spartan server

Does anyone also have the code for your health to go up when you get hit/?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 04, 2006, 06:30:14 PM[/size][hr]I keep getting errors, help![br][size=1]Posted at: August 07, 2006, 03:23:01 AM[/size][hr]OMG, someone help! sorry for double posting but plz HELP! SOS!![br][size=1]Posted at: August 07, 2006, 06:22:00 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE ANYONE HELP! I DONT KNOW WHERE TO PLACE IT!!

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

Lol Spartan-Server = excellent source, 10x better than mine, thanks Budda, u r0ck w00t!
thanks big time, it owns now

EDIT:
Im just wondering, I keep getting errors with that java code Budda gave me, did i put this in the right place or something? Heres a pic: (note the stuff i highlighted is the one that causes errors)

Client.Java
-I chose to use the item ID 1024 for an example instead of wasting my time finding the id for dragon-

And when I compile, i get errors saying that there are illegal letters or something i cant remember.
Did i do tihis right?

Read full topic

item.title: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

Well, I don’t really like Testscape because the graphics are terrible, I dont know how to become and admin, hmmm, does anyone mind putting screenshots of Cheezscape, jus so I can see what it looks like, and Nixscape, I cant compile it, even though I’ve read the rules… It would have been good if I could just compile it lol…

Anyhow, I would like to stick with my empty server for now…
Heh, please bare with me as I don’t know what the heck I’m doing, right now I’m wondering where to place all the data in the client… This is what it looks like right now:

There is too many letters if i show u so I’ll just get a picture:

Java.Client

Java. Client ->
Here, I scroll to the right a bit…

Java. Client —>
Here I scroll to the right again and yea…

Where am I suppost to write the scripts if their all bunched up into one line like that?
For example, where could I write the command that 'Budda gave me in the client?

Thanks in return.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible

item.title: I'm in deed of help for my server... please help if possible
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

  1. Download a source which has this, about 99% do.
  2. Same as 1.

else if (command.startsWith(“dragonset”))
{
addItem (IDHERE, #);
addItem (IDHERE, #);
sendMessage(“Learn Java pl0x”);
}
4.
else if (command.startsWith(“dragonset”) && playerRights == 2)
{
addItem (IDHERE, #);
addItem (IDHERE, #);
sendMessage(“Learn Java pl0x”);
}

Read full topic
